```{r}

library(ggplot2)
library(ggrepel)

csv_files <- list.files(path="../data/preprocessed",pattern = ".*.csv$")
for (file in csv_files){
    data <- read.csv(paste("../data/preprocessed/",file,sep=""))

    n_rows <- nrow(data)
    indices <- round(seq(1, n_rows, length.out = 100))
    data_subset <- data[indices, ]
    label_data <- data_subset[sample(nrow(data_subset), 15), ]

    p <- ggplot(data_subset, aes(x=Frequency.rank, y=Length.of.characters, label=Word)) +
        geom_point() +
        geom_text_repel(data=label_data, aes(label=Word)) +
        labs(x="Frequency Rank", y="Length of Characters", title=file) +
        theme_minimal()

    print(p)
}
```
